Pure dominance from the #57 Mercedes-AMG of Daniel Morad! 🔥 Setting an untouchable fastest lap of 1:26.567. That's how you lay down a marker. #IMSA #MercedesAMG #RacePace 🏎️💨

Digging into the data reveals some serious untapped potential! The #39 BMW of Sean McAlister had a theoretical optimal lap 0.545s faster than his best. So much more pace to unlock! 🚀 #IMSA #BMW #DataDriven

Talk about consistency! ⏱️ Denis Dupont in the #76 Hyundai earns our Metronome Award for lap time. With a std dev of just 0.025s over 5 laps, he was surgically precise! 📊 #IMSA #Hyundai #ConsistencyKing
The widest teammate pace gap goes to Car #64 Aston Martin! 😲 A massive 6.044s average delta between drivers. That's a huge performance swing! #IMSA #AstonMartin #TeammateBattle #RaceAnalytics

Tire wear insights are in! BMW takes the top spot for best tire management, showing incredible durability. Meanwhile, McLaren drivers faced the toughest challenge on rubber. 📉📈 #IMSA #BMW #McLaren #TireStrategy
